<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1310794_founda_0.FHCheckSecurity</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><mobile_callable>false</mobile_callable><name>FHCheckSecurity</name><sandbox_callable>false</sandbox_callable><script><![CDATA[var FHCheckSecurity = Class.create();
FHCheckSecurity.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
        this.utils = new FHScanUtils();
        this.optionsHandler = new FHOptionsHandler();
    },

    /**
     * execute(ctx)
     * Security checks entrypoint. Requires ctx.metrics.table_exists to be true.
     */
    execute: function(ctx) {
        if (!ctx.metrics || !ctx.metrics.table_exists) return;

        ctx.registerCategory && ctx.registerCategory('security', 'Security', 'fa-shield-alt');

        var tablesToCheck = ctx.getTablesToCheck && ctx.getTablesToCheck();
        ctx.metrics = ctx.metrics || {};
        ctx.metrics.security_tables_checked = tablesToCheck;

        this._checkACLs(ctx, tablesToCheck);
    },

    /**
     * _checkACLs - collect ACLs in the table hierarchy and compute summaries.
     */
    _checkACLs: function(ctx, tablesToCheck) {
        var tableName = ctx.getTableName && ctx.getTableName();
        tablesToCheck = tablesToCheck || [tableName];

        var acls = [];
        var aclsByOperation = { read: 0, write: 0, create: 0, delete: 0 };

        // Build a GlideRecord query for ACLs affecting the table or parents.
        var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_security_acl');

        // Construct an encoded query: name starting with tableName or any parent table
        var encoded = '';
        for (var i = 0; i < tablesToCheck.length; i++) {
            if (i === 0) encoded += 'nameSTARTSWITH' + tablesToCheck[i];
            else encoded += '^ORnameSTARTSWITH' + tablesToCheck[i];
        }
        gr.addEncodedQuery(encoded);
        gr.addQuery('active', true);
        gr.query();

        while (gr.next()) {
            var aclName = ctx.safeGetValue ? ctx.safeGetValue(gr, 'name') : gr.getValue('name');
            var operation = ctx.safeGetValue ? ctx.safeGetValue(gr, 'operation') : gr.getValue('operation');

            // determine which table this ACL is primarily for (closest match in hierarchy)
            var aclTable = tableName;
            for (var j = 0; j < tablesToCheck.length; j++) {
                if (aclName.indexOf(tablesToCheck[j]) === 0) {
                    aclTable = tablesToCheck[j];
                    break;
                }
            }

            var aclInfo = {
                sys_id: gr.getUniqueValue(),
                name: aclName,
                table: aclTable,
                inherited: (aclTable !== tableName),
                operation: operation,
                admin_overrides: (ctx.safeGetValue ? ctx.safeGetValue(gr, 'admin_overrides') === 'true' : gr.getValue('admin_overrides') === 'true'),
                condition: (ctx.safeGetValue ? !!ctx.safeGetValue(gr, 'condition') : !!gr.getValue('condition'))
            };

            acls.push(aclInfo);

            if (operation && aclsByOperation.hasOwnProperty(operation)) {
                aclsByOperation[operation]++;
            }
        }

        // Use centralized helper to add UI items and metrics (preserving nested shape)
        try {
            this.utils.addCategoryAndMetrics(ctx, 'security', 'acls', 'ACLs', acls, {
                table: 'sys_security_acl',
                icon: 'fa-lock',
                color: '#dc3545',
                preserveNested: true,
                countKeys: { total: 'acl_count', direct: 'acl_direct_count', inherited: 'acl_inherited_count' }
            });

            // Keep operations summary in the nested meta area for compatibility with existing widget keys
            ctx.metrics = ctx.metrics || {};
            // place summary under acls_meta to avoid clobbering the array
            ctx.metrics.acls_meta = ctx.metrics.acls_meta || {};
            ctx.metrics.acls_meta.acls_by_operation = aclsByOperation;
        } catch (e) {
            // fallback to original structure if helper fails
            ctx.addCategoryItems && ctx.addCategoryItems('security', 'acl', 'ACLs', acls, {
                table: 'sys_security_acl',
                icon: 'fa-lock',
                color: '#dc3545'
            });

            ctx.metrics.acls = acls;
            ctx.metrics.acls = ctx.metrics.acls || [];
            ctx.metrics.acls.acl_count = acls.length;
            ctx.metrics.acls.acl_direct_count = acls.filter(function(a) { return !a.inherited; }).length;
            ctx.metrics.acls.acl_inherited_count = acls.filter(function(a) { return a.inherited; }).length;
            ctx.metrics.acls.acls_by_operation = aclsByOperation;
        }

        if (aclsByOperation.read === 0) {
            ctx.addIssue('NO_READ_ACL', 'No read ACL defined for this table or its parents', 'medium', {
                record_table: 'sys_security_acl',
                record_filter: 'nameSTARTSWITH' + tableName,
                category: 'security'
            });
        }
        if (aclsByOperation.write === 0) {
            ctx.addIssue('NO_WRITE_ACL', 'No write ACL defined for this table or its parents', 'medium', {
                record_table: 'sys_security_acl',
                record_filter: 'nameSTARTSWITH' + tableName,
                category: 'security'
            });
        }
    },

    type: 'FHCheckSecurity'
};
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2026-01-04 09:00:00</sys_created_on><sys_id>security_12345678901234567890123</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>FHCheckSecurity</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Foundation Health Analyzer" source="x_1310794_founda_0">d852994c8312321083e1b4a6feaad3e6</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Foundation Health Analyzer">d852994c8312321083e1b4a6feaad3e6</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_security_12345678901234567890123</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2026-01-04 19:00:49</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
